name: 50 Coins of Deadly Doom
description:
This is the first game I created to learn how to make games on the Playdate.  My favorite genre of games is Hack 'Slash games from the NES era so I decided to create game I wanted to play.  I hope you enjoy!

I also create tons of Playdate and Retro Game content on YouTube, check me out here : https://www.youtube.com/c/EverCanadian

If people like this game and want to show support please donate to  my Extra-Life : https://www.extra-life.org/index.cfm?fuseaction=donordrive.participant&participa...
